title: Sometimes selling a unit causes the "sell for X gold" banner to stick
body:
Title.  It happens randomly, and I won't be able to buy any units, or even see which units are able to be bought, because I'm stuck on the "Sell for X gold" screen instead.  I've found that the only way to clear it is to pick up a unit on my bench and place it back on the bench.  

I just had a game where I sold my first unit and was going to buy 3 from the selection, but the "sell for X gold" banner stuck.  Since there were no units on my bench to pick up and put down again, and I could not buy any units because of the banner, I was 100% stuck, and watched the minion rounds kill me.  I eventually left the game and reconnected (which solved it), but ew.

replies.body:
Wow, that's the worst-case scenario. (Except, at least it was early game.)

This USED to happen, but could be removed by waiting or alt-tab, or similar fiddling. Now, it doesn't seem to go away unless a unit is sold.

Sometimes the only way to get rid of that is to sell something. Sometimes you don't WANT to sell something.
